arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen vs PSG – Dembélé’s strong words after his festive return
arts.sum: Ousmane Dembélé, 28-year-old Paris Saint-Germain striker, spoke to Canal+ after the 2-7 victory against Bayer Leverkusen this Tuesday at the BayArena as part of Matchday 3 of the 2025-2026 Champions League. arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen vs PSG – The best player is elected!
arts.sum: On Tuesday at the BayArena, Paris Saint-Germain won Matchday 3 of the 2025-2026 Champions League against Bayer Leverkusen with a score of 2-7. Following this match, UEFA voted the player of the match. Nuno Mendes (23-year-old left-back) is far from a surprising choice, as he delivered a very strong performance.
